lead_paragraph: A former Scotland Yard detective, Jeff Rees, who helped review potential match-fixing was picked to run the sport’s new integrity unit. Tennis’s four governing bodies also adopted an anti-corruption code to ensure the same set of penalties apply across the professional ranks.
